This directory contains artifacts produced by other open source
projects that X10 depends on.  We mirror them here to ensure
a stable URL to use in our build project.  

The contents of this directory are:

Eclipse Java Compiler (ECJ) 
  File: ecj-3.5.1.jar
  Mirrored from eclipse.org
  License: Eclipse Public License 1.0
  Current version: 3.5.1
  External URL: http://archive.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-3.5.1-200909170800

LALR Parser Generator (LPG) runtime
  File: lpg.runtime.java_2.0.17.jar
  Mirrored from http://sourceforge.net/projects/lpg/
  License: Eclipse Public License 1.0
  Current version: 2.0.17
  External URL: http://lpg.sourceforge.net/updates/plugins/lpg.runtime.java_2.0.17.jar

  File: lpg.runtime_2.0.17.jar
  Extracted from the above: lpg.runtime.java_2.0.17.jar:lpgruntime.jar
  Compatibility jar for older builds

  File: lpg.runtime.java_2.0.18.jar
  Mirrored from http://sourceforge.net/projects/lpg/
  License: Eclipse Public License 1.0
  Current version: 2.0.18
  External URL: http://lpg.sourceforge.net/updates/plugins/lpg.runtime.java_2.0.18.jar

  File: lpg.runtime_2.0.18.jar
  Extracted from the above: lpg.runtime.java_2.0.18.jar:lpgruntime.jar
  Compatibility jar for older builds

  File: lpg.runtime.java_2.0.20.jar
  Mirrored from http://sourceforge.net/projects/lpg/
  License: Eclipse Public License 1.0
  Current version: 2.0.20
  External URL: http://lpg.sourceforge.net/updates/plugins/lpg.runtime.java_2.0.20.jar

  File: lpg.runtime.java_2.0.22.jar
  Mirrored from http://sourceforge.net/projects/lpg/
  License: Eclipse Public License 1.0
  Current version: 2.0.22
  External URL: http://lpg.sourceforge.net/updates/plugins/lpg.runtime.java_2.0.22.jar

Eclipse Rich Client Platform (RCP)
  File: org.eclipse.rcp-3.6.zip
  Mirrored from eclipse.org
  License: Eclipse Public License 1.0
  Current version: 3.6
  External URL: http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-3.6-201006080911/org.eclipse.rcp-3.6.zip

  File: org.eclipse.equinox.common_3.6.0.v20100503.jar
  Extracted from the above: org.eclipse.rcp-3.6.zip

Apache Commons Math Library
  File: commons-math-2.1.zip
  Mirrored from apache.org
  License: Apache License 2.0
  Current version: 2.1
  External URL: http://www.apache.org/dist/commons/math/binaries/commons-math-2.1.zip

  File: commons-math-2.1.jar
  Extracted from the above: commons-math-2.1.zip:commons-math-2.1/commons-math-2.1.jar

  File: commons-math-2.2.zip
  Mirrored from apache.org
  License: Apache License 2.0
  Current version: 2.2
  External URL: http://www.apache.org/dist/commons/math/binaries/commons-math-2.2.zip

  File: commons-math-2.2.jar
  Extracted from the above: commons-math-2.2.zip:commons-math-2.2/commons-math-2.2.jar

Boehm-Demers-Weiser Conservative Garbage Collector for C/C++
  File: bdwgc-7.1.tar.gz
  Mirrored from http://www.hpl.hp.com/personal/Hans_Boehm/gc/gc_source/
  License: http://www.hpl.hp.com/personal/Hans_Boehm/gc/license.txt
  Current version: 7.1
  External URL: http://www.hpl.hp.com/personal/Hans_Boehm/gc/gc_source/gc-7.1.tar.gz
